des:
The Sounds of the Planet it's based on 10 Categories, that contains more than 30 sounds availables.

The Categories are Water, Air, Earth, Fire, Countryside, Home, Mountain, City, Animals, Premium.

HOW TO USE THE SKILL:

Start by saying "Alexa, open the Sounds of the Planet". Alexa will ask you what sound you want to hear, or will make you choose one of the Categories. Saying for example "Water", you can hear the list of all sounds of that Category. If you say "All", you can listen to (and read in the Alexa App) the list of all sounds of the skill. 

If you don't say a duration (saying for example "the farm in tuscany for 2 hours and 20 minutes"), the sound will continue until you say "Alexa, stop".

You can also use The Sounds of the Planet in a Alexa Routine. To do so, follow these steps:

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" > Select "The Sounds of the Planet"
6. Choose Device to perform the routine > SAVE.


To know the complete list of Commands availables, you can read down here in the specific section.

COMMANDS AVAILABLES: 

The commands you can use with the skill are:

"Categories" : you hear the list of categories
<Category> (ex. "water") : you hear the list of all the sounds availables for the category
<Sound> (ex. "farm in Tuscany") : you start the sound 
<Sound> for <duration> (ex. "farm in Tuscany for 20 minutes and 10 seconds") : you start the sound for the time duration you pronounced
"Next" : stop the current sound and start the next one from the same Category
"Previous" : stop the current sound and start the previous one from the same Category
"First" - "Second" - "Last" : you start the first / second / .. / last sound of the same Category
"Stop" : stop the current sound
"Random" : start a sound, randomly choosen by the skill
"Random for" <duration> : start a sound, randomly choosen by the skill, for the time duration you pronounced
"Updates": listen to the last updates of the skill
